text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Students at Tracen often compete<n>with each other in
scrimmage races as<n>part of their training regimens. Silence<n>
Suzuka is taking part in one such race<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Still concerned after seeing how<n>troubled she appeared in
the library<n>the other day, I decide to come out to<n>observe
her.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka, I take it that you understand<n>the objective of this
scrimmage, yes?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... To practice the techniques I'll be<n>using in my debut
race.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: That's correct. Your debut is coming<n>up next month.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
We've been focusing on having you<n>better conserve your
speed and<n>energy. It's time to put everything to<n>practice in
a proper race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I've been looking forward to this day,<n>Suzuka. Show me
how far you've<n>come under your trainer's guidance.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I won't be giving up the lead.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Heh. I couldn't have said it better<n>myself, so right back at
you. I'm<n>heading for the gates now.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
All I have to do is remember what she<n>taught me—conserve
energy at the<n>start and save it for the final leg...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Right... I've got this. This is the way<n>it's supposed to be
done. I'll win for<n>sure.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The gates spring open on Silence<n>Suzuka's latest
scrimmage race.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Not yet... I still need to conserve my<n>energy...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
To anyone who witnessed her<n>tremendous lead during her
tryout<n>race, today's Silence Suzuka appears<n>to be an
entirely different runner.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No doubt she is trying to implement<n>new speed conservation
techniques<n>introduced by her new trainer. But it's<n>hard to
say if they're effective...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pant... Gasp...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She finds herself surrounded by her<n>rivals; distress and
frustration are<n>uncharacteristicallyscrawled across<n>her
face.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She staggers into the race's final<n>leg...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: This is the homestretch... Now!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: W-wait... My legs... don't have the<n>energy...

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: This ends here!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As if set off by Air Groove's own<n>final push, the other
runners begin to<n>overtake Silence Suzuka one after<n>
another, leaving her buried at the<n>back of the pack.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I can't see anything...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: My view... is gone...

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Eighth place... A regrettable finish<n>indeed.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
You stuck to the plan and performed<n>brilliantly in the first
half of the race,<n>but you weren't able to break away<n>in the
second half. Why is that?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Suzuka? What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah... I-I'm sorry... Um...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'm honestly... not sure. I don't... I<n>don't know what
happened...

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
...I see. These things can take some<n>time, so it's safe to say
you might not<n>be used to this strategy yet.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
In that case, why don't we push back<n>your debut race?
This is not the time<n>to be reckless.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh?!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That means canceling my race... A-are<n>you telling me not to
run?!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Please calm down. All I'm saying is<n>that we should wait for
a better time.<n>You can race once you've gotten<n>more used
to—

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Wait, please! I can run now! I mean, Iwant to run now!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I need to be in the lead—

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
But you've yet to master your current<n>running style. Even
you can see that,<n>can you not?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka please listen to me. I'm just<n>trying to help ensure
that you are in<n>top form for your debut race.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Let's take some time to get you<n>accustomed to the correct
technique.<n>You will be racing and winning plenty<n>after that.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: How much time... is "some time"?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Pardon? I didn't catch that.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry. It's nothing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I'm... going home now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A dejected Suzuka totters off the<n>track with the faltering
steps of a lost<n>child.
